title: Azure Storage with Pivotal Application Services for Windows and Steeltoe Workshop
content:
Pivotal Platform Architecture helps companies learn how to solve IT and engineering challenges. We encourage you to explore our workshops. Build the future with Pivotal!  Azure Storage with Pivotal Application Services for Windows and Steeltoe Workshop
  Workshop Conceptos Workshop Población Introduction & Credentials Setup Environment Bind the Microsoft Azure Service Broker Consume the Microsoft Azure Service Broker in your application Push Microservice to PASW Continuing Your .NET Cloud Native Journey

title: Conceptos
content: Conceptos Aprenda lo básico, comprenda las arquitecturas y complete los conceptos básicos detrás del taller.

title: Población
content: Población Construye arquitecturas y prueba los conceptos centrales detrás del taller.
